Explanation: Changing 'humidity' affects only the 'comfort' variable according to the given code structure. There is no code-dependent link between 'humidity' and 'result', as these are controlled by separate and independent checks within the function. causal_map_integration: Increasing humidity above 70% will make the comfort 'humid', and increasing temperature above 30 will make the result 'hot'. To change the result to 'hot' when comfort is 'humid', the temperature needs to be increased to above 30 while keeping humidity above 70.
